title: Gary Kremen, Founder Of Match.com
teaser: From Scratch Host Jessica Harris speaks with Gary Kremen, serial entrepreneur and founder of Match.com. Harris also speaks with Fred Swaniker, co-founder of the African Leadership Academy.
contentencoded:
From Scratch Host Jessica Harris speaks with Gary Kremen, serial entrepreneur and founder of Match.com. Harris also speaks with Fred Swaniker, co-founder of the African Leadership Academy.
